name: iShopper.com
tag_list: online-shopping, comparison-shopping, compare-prices, mobile, laptop, cameras, home-appliances, jewellery
overview:
iShopper.com is India’s leading comparison shopping site, letting users compare prices and products across categories and e-commerce sites. We aim to be the starting point of online shopping in India with best tools to help buyers make informed decisions.

Whether you’re a first time buyer yet to decide what to buy or a frequent shopper who knows what exactly you’re looking for, iShopper is the place to start. iShopper allows shoppers to quickly find products and compare their features and prices from merchants and sellers of all sizes and scope. The site provides comprehensive information about various products, allows you to compare them, get feedback from other community members and decide what’s the best price.

We’re growing rapidly enhancing our database with more categories, more products, expert reviews and data and analysis around various catalogues and will continue to do so, so that you always buy the right product at the right price.
